    • Constructor Detail

      • RevloAPI

        public RevloAPI(java.lang.String key)
         throws RevloException
        Create the instance for the REVLO API
        Parameters:
        key - Revlo KEY (You can get this in https://www.revlo.co/settings/api )
        Throws:
        RevloException - if the API key is not valid

        public Redemption getRedemption(int id)
                         throws RevloException

        Parameters:
        id - ID of the redemption

        Throws:
        RevloException - If connection failed

      • getRedemptions

        public java.util.Set<Redemption> getRedemptions()
                                         throws RevloException
        Get all Redemptions avaible in you account
        No filters can be apply
        Returns:
        Return a Set of Redemptions
        Throws:
        RevloException - Error in conecction or Error of APIKey

      • getRedemptions

        public java.util.Set<Redemption> getRedemptions(RedemtionFilter... filters)
                                         throws RevloException
        Get all Redemptions avaible in you account
        Parameters:
        filters - Filter to get any items
        Returns:
        Return a Set of Redemptions
        Throws:
        RevloException - Error in conecction or Error of APIKey

      • getRedemptions

        public java.util.Set<Redemption> getRedemptions(int page,
                                                RedemtionFilter... filters)
                                         throws RevloException
        Get all Redemptions avaible in you account
        Parameters:
        page - Page to rad contend
        filters - set filter to rebemtions
        If you can not filter use RedemtionFilter.NONE
        Returns:
        Return a Set of Redemptions
        Throws:
        RevloException - Error in conecction or Error of APIKey

      • getFan

        public Fan getFan(java.lang.String twitchname)
           throws RevloException
        Get a fan for your revlo
        Parameters:
        twitchname - Username for the fan
        Returns:
        Fan Class
        Throws:
        RevloException - If the connection is failed or username is invalid

      • giveBonus

        public Fan giveBonus(java.lang.String twichname,
                     int amount)
              throws RevloException
        Give a bonus to a Fan
        Parameters:
        twichname - username of the fan to give the bonus
        amount - amount of the bonus (between -1000000 and 1000000)
        Returns:
        Fan instance
        Throws:
        RevloException - If the connection is failed or amount is invalid
